materials.name: Pure Copper
materials.description: Pure copper, excellent for monolithic bullets

materials.name: Gilding Metal (95/5)
materials.description: 95% copper, 5% zinc - common bullet jacket material

materials.name: Brass (70/30)
materials.description: 70% copper, 30% zinc - harder than gilding metal

materials.name: Lead Core
materials.description: Pure lead - traditional bullet core material

materials.name: Jacketed Lead Core
materials.description: Jacketed bullet with lead core - typical FMJ construction (gilding metal jacket + lead core)

materials.name: Lead-Tin Alloy (95/5)
materials.description: 95% lead, 5% tin - common cast bullet alloy
